languages.text: Удача сопутствовала хладному торговцу много лет. Он даже нашел некоторое удовольствие в том, чтобы вести дела по закону, не опасаясь стражи и конкурентов. Впрочем, в один печальный день он все равно утратил даровавшую ему власть грамоту... тем же способом, каким и приобрел.
languages.translation_comment: игрок хоуп, нейтрал или поклонился ктану

languages.text: For many years, luck was on the Cold Trader's side. He even found a certain satisfaction in working under the law without fear of guards or rivals. But one sad day, he lost the certificate that gave him his power... in the same manner in which he had acquired it.
languages.original_text: Удача сопутствовала хладному торговцу много лет. Он даже нашел некоторое удовольствие в том, чтобы вести дела по закону, не опасаясь стражи и конкурентов. Впрочем, в один печальный день он все равно утратил даровавшую ему власть грамоту... тем же способом, каким и приобрел.

traits.locale_text: For many years the luck was on the Cold Trader's side. He even found a certain satisfaction in working under the law, not fearing guards or rivals. Yet on one sad day, he still lost the certificate that gave him his power... the same way he acquired it.

For many years, luck was on the Cold Trader's side. He even found a certain satisfaction in working under the law without fear of guards or rivals. But one sad day, he lost the certificate that gave him his power... in the same manner in which he had acquired it.

For many years, luck was on the Cold Trader's side. He even found a certain satisfaction in working under the law without fear of guards or rivals. But one sad day, he lost the certificate that gave him his power... in the same manner in which he had acquired it.

languages.text: 多年以来，好运一直眷顾着这位冷市商人。他光明正大地从事冷市贸易，不再担心警卫或竞争对手，甚至从中获得了某种满足感。但某一天，他失去了这份权力的证书……他失去证书的方式，与他当年获得它的方式如出一辙。
languages.original_text: For many years, luck was on the Cold Trader's side. He even found a certain satisfaction in working under the law without fear of guards or rivals. But one sad day, he lost the certificate that gave him his power... in the same manner in which he had acquired it.

traits.locale_text: 多年以来，好运一直眷顾着这位冷市商人。他光明正大地从事冷市贸易，不再担心警卫或竞争对手，甚至从中获得了某种满足感。但某一天，他失去了这份权力的证书……他失去证书的方式，与他当年获得它的方式如出一辙。

languages.text: Viele Jahre lang war das Glück auf der Seite des Kalthändlers. Es war sogar recht angenehm, im Rahmen des Gesetzes zu arbeiten, ohne Angst vor Wachen oder Rivalen haben zu müssen. Doch eines traurigen Tages verlor er das Zertifikat, das ihm seine Macht verliehen hatte ... auf dieselbe Weise, auf die er es einst bekommen hatte.
languages.original_text: For many years, luck was on the Cold Trader's side. He even found a certain satisfaction in working under the law without fear of guards or rivals. But one sad day, he lost the certificate that gave him his power... in the same manner in which he had acquired it.

traits.locale_text: Viele Jahre lang war das Glück auf der Seite des Kalthändlers. Es war sogar recht angenehm, im Rahmen des Gesetzes zu arbeiten, ohne Angst vor Wachen oder Rivalen haben zu müssen. Doch eines traurigen Tages verlor er das Zertifikat, das ihm seine Macht verliehen hatte ... auf dieselbe Weise, auf die er es einst bekommen hatte.

languages.text: La chance sourit pendant de nombreuses années à l'adepte du Commerce Froid. Il trouva même une certaine satisfaction à travailler en toute légalité, ce qui lui permettait de commercer sans avoir à craindre les gardes ou les rivaux. Mais un jour, il perdit le certificat qui lui avait octroyé ce privilège... de la même manière qu'il l'avait obtenu.
languages.original_text: For many years, luck was on the Cold Trader's side. He even found a certain satisfaction in working under the law without fear of guards or rivals. But one sad day, he lost the certificate that gave him his power... in the same manner in which he had acquired it.

traits.locale_text: La chance sourit pendant de nombreuses années à l'adepte du Commerce Froid. Il trouva même une certaine satisfaction à travailler en toute légalité, ce qui lui permettait de commercer sans avoir à craindre les gardes ou les rivaux. Mais un jour, il perdit le certificat qui lui avait octroyé ce privilège... de la même manière qu'il l'avait obtenu.

languages.text: Durante años, la suerte estuvo de parte del Comerciante Frío. Incluso encontró cierta satisfacción en el trabajo legal, sin miedo a los guardias ni a sus rivales. Por desgracia, un día perdió el certificado que le concedía poder... de la misma forma en que él lo había adquirido.
languages.original_text: For many years, luck was on the Cold Trader's side. He even found a certain satisfaction in working under the law without fear of guards or rivals. But one sad day, he lost the certificate that gave him his power... in the same manner in which he had acquired it.

traits.locale_text: Durante años, la suerte estuvo de parte del Comerciante Frío. Incluso encontró cierta satisfacción en el trabajo legal, sin miedo a los guardias ni a sus rivales. Por desgracia, un día perdió el certificado que le concedía poder... de la misma forma en que él lo había adquirido.

languages.text: 長年の間、運はコールド・トレーダーに味方していた。彼は衛兵や対抗者を恐れることなく、合法的に活動できることにある種の満足すら覚えていた。ただある日、彼は悲しくも力の根源である免状を失くしてしまう…その力を手に入れたのと同じ方法で。
languages.original_text: For many years, luck was on the Cold Trader's side. He even found a certain satisfaction in working under the law without fear of guards or rivals. But one sad day, he lost the certificate that gave him his power... in the same manner in which he had acquired it.

traits.locale_text: 長年の間、運はコールド・トレーダーに味方していた。彼は衛兵や対抗者を恐れることなく、合法的に活動できることにある種の満足すら覚えていた。ただある日、彼は悲しくも力の根源である免状を失くしてしまう…それを手に入れたのと同じ方法で。

languages.text: Uzun yıllar boyunca şans Soğuk Tacir'in yanındaydı. Muhafızlardan ve rakiplerden korkmadan, kanunlara uyarak iş yapmak ona tatmin bile sağlamaya başlamıştı. Ancak bir gün ona gücünü veren tasdiknameyi kaybetti. Onu nasıl aldıysa aynı şekilde.
languages.original_text: For many years, luck was on the Cold Trader's side. He even found a certain satisfaction in working under the law without fear of guards or rivals. But one sad day, he lost the certificate that gave him his power... in the same manner in which he had acquired it.

traits.locale_text: Uzun yıllar boyunca şans Soğuk Tacir'in yanındaydı. Muhafızlardan ve rakiplerden korkmadan, kanunlara uyarak iş yapmak ona tatmin bile sağlamaya başlamıştı. Ancak bir gün ona gücünü veren sertifikayı kaybetti. Onu nasıl aldıysa aynı şekilde.

languages.translation_comment: игрок хоуп, нейтрал или поклонился ктану
